article: a top south korean presidential adviser said monday his aim is to find `` a common denominator '' with the united states for a peaceful end to north korea 's nuclear standoff when he heads to washington for talks this week .
abstract: ahead of critical meetings south korea polishes its proposal on north korea 's nuclear issue
